message:
On the cover of the latest Game Informer. It stars Death, and he wears pants made of skulls and bones. No other details revealed yet.

http://i.imgur.com/kIPBr.jpg
I feel embarrassed just looking at it.

You know what, I'm not going to leave it at that. Let me make a list of the things I hate: heavy metal hair, two scythes (with skulls), a crow, bulging pecs, skull face, skull PANTS, bits of Skeletor's laundry and green chest acne. 

And I *liked* the last guy.

For reference, some artwork for Death, circa Darksiders 1.

http://images.wikia.com/egamia/images/b/b1/Joe_Madureira%5C%27s_Death.jpg
